name: The Jewel of Alithia
description:
Posted for Bring Out Your Dead - An unfinished interactive fiction game about exploring a mysterious castle with a party of helpful allies. I really like the idea of combining a exploration/puzzle IF game with an RPG-style group of party members who each bring a new capability to the table.

If I ever continue this, I know there's more to be done to bring the NPCs to convincing life, on top of building more puzzles and coming up with a good ending. Right now you can meet three party members (I include Scrap, of course) and gather two jewels. Please give it a shot and let me know what you think!
